name: Hex Puzzle Blocks: Skill Game
description:
Intro :-

This is a challenging puzzle game with a simple gameplay. It can be played within 30 seconds to train your brain and develop your mental skills as well as keeping you mentally fit. It is a perfect pause for a short period of refreshment in metro, bus, school or in the office. With this simple and addictive puzzle game, challenge yourself and compete with your friends, colleagues and the family.


How to Play/Rules :-

The goal is to drop fruit blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the fruit blocks from filling the screen.

A ranking system has also been added to compete with your friends, colleagues and circles.

No time limit, no color match! Fill all the grids with the colored fruit blocks and enjoy this addictive puzzle game.


Features include :-

1) Simple UI
2) Addictive gameplay. Simple to learn but hard to play
3) Cool music and sound effects
4) View your current and high score anytime
5) Nice animation
6) No IAP, universal support and awesome gameplay!

Try it yourself!
